MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KA9 postcode area of Prestwick. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 6.00pm to carryout repair work on a pillar across from Newdykes Road and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:30pm on 8th December 2020.
